animal.question: I quack and waddle. I like to swim in a puddle. Who am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am often yellow when I'm young.
🌾 I eat seeds and bread.
💧 I love playing in the water

animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and give you milk to drink. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I often have black and white spots.
💚 I eat grass in a field.
🔔 I have a bell around my neck

animal.question: I love to eat carrots and hop around. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 My favourite food is orange.
🐾 I have long ears.
🐇 I have a fluffy tail.

animal.question: I am a big cat with a loud roar and a mane. Who am I?

hints.text: 👑 I am known as the King of the Jungle.
🇿🇦 I live in Africa.
🦁 The male has a mane.

animal.question: I'm a black and white striped animal from Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes help me hide.
🌿 I eat grass.
🐴 I look similar to a horse.

animal.question: I'm a slow-moving reptile with a shell on my back. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I like to eat lettuce.
🐢 I can hide inside my shell.
👴 I can live for a long time.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears, and I love peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I am the largest land animal.
💦 I use my trunk to spray water.
🐘 I have tusks.

animal.question: I swing from trees and eat bananas. Who am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I love to peel and eat yellow fruit.
🙊 I like to make noises and play.
🌴 I live in the jungle.

animal.question: I'm a nocturnal bird with big eyes and I hoot. What am I?

hints.text: 🦉 I can turn my head almost all the way around.
🌙 I sleep during the day.
🐭 I like to eat mice.

animal.question: I live in the ocean, have eight arms, and can squirt ink. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have suckers on my arms.
🌊 I change colours to blend in.
🏴 I use black liquid to hide.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves and sometimes pretty colors. I need sun and water to grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 Bees love to visit me.
☀️ I grow best in the sunshine.
💧 You might give me water from a watering can.

plant.question: I am tall and strong, with a trunk and many branches. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.
🪵 You can make a house from my wood.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Cows like to eat me and we can play on me. What am I?

hints.text: ⚽ You can run and play on me!
🐑 Some animals eat me.
🚜 I cover the ground.

plant.question: I grow on a vine, and you can eat me. Some are green and some are purple. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I am often made into juice.
🧺 I grow in bunches.
☀️ I need a lot of sun to grow.

plant.question: I am long and orange, and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
👓 You can improve your vision by eating me.
🥗 I am often eaten raw or cooked in soup.

plant.question: I have a prickly stem and beautiful, fragrant flowers. Be careful when you pick me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥀 I am a symbol of love.
🌹 My petals come in many colors.
📌 I have thorns to protect myself.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when heated, and people love to eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I come from a cob.
🍿 I am often buttery and salty.
🎬 You often eat me at the cinema.

plant.question: I am a big, round fruit with a green rind and sweet, red flesh. I am perfect for a summer picnic. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am mostly water.
🔪 You need a big knife to cut me!
😋 I am very refreshing on a hot day.

plant.question: I am a small, brown seed that can be ground into a powder. Bakers use me to make bread and cookies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I come from wheat.
🍪 I am used to make many baked goods.
🍞 I am a key ingredient to make bread.

plant.question: I am a plant that grows in the water and has large, round leaves that float. Frogs like to sit on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 I am a favourite seat for frogs.
🏞️ I often grow in ponds.
🌺 I can have beautiful flowers.
